desktop-redirect.title:
Which Howl’s Moving
Castle character are
you most like?

experience-landing.title: Introducing LOEWE x Howl's Moving Castle
experience-landing.game-copy: Which character are you most like?

home.title:
Let your heart
guide you
home.copy:
The decisions you make
define your character.

door-dial.copy: Where will your heart lead you?

character-reveal.rune-copy: To hide your desires is to hide your heart.
character-reveal.howl-copy: Free spirited and charming, with a burning desire to do good.
character-reveal.sophie-copy: Strong willed, loving and happy just being happy.
character-reveal.turnip-head-copy: Playful and shy, with more loyalty than you can shake a stick at.
character-reveal.calcifer-copy: Wise, witty and sarcastic with a burning confidence.
character-reveal.castle-copy: Calm, protective, and dependable, with a passion for travelling.
character-reveal.witch-copy: Stylish, sharp, and shrewd, with a hunger for the finer things in life.
character-reveal.heen-copy: Gentle and faithfully loyal. Friends with everyone, belongs to no one.
character-reveal.markl-copy: Kind, cunning and dependable, won't suffer fools or time-wasters.

quotes.door-dial-line: It's all so familiar yet I know I've never been here before.
quotes.which-hat-line: You're wearing that hat? After all the magic I used to make your dress pretty?
quotes.choose-a-spell-line: It can't be good for the table.
quotes.hide-among-things-line: All I do is hide. All of this magic is to keep everybody away.
quotes.feed-calcifer-line: ... the best blaze brightest when circumstances are at their worst
quotes.your-star-demon-line: You who swallowed a falling star, ‘O heartless man, your heart shall soon belong to me.

instructions.which-hat-title: Tap and hold to pick a hat
instructions.choose-a-spell-title: Tap and hold to choose a spell
instructions.hide-among-things-title: Touch & move to find a trinket

holding.heading: The castle is coming to town...
holding.copy: LOEWE x Howl's Moving Castle launches on February 2, stay tuned!
